title: Irvine Meetup This Friday
summary:
Key ideas
- Scott will be at the University Center food court in Irvine, California on Friday, October 11 for the Meetups Everywhere tour.
- Anyone is invited, regardless of whether they are a typical SSC reader or feel awkward about attending.
- There is no contact person for the meetup, but Scott will try to respond to questions in the comments.

Key learnings
- Meetups Everywhere is a tour where Scott visits different locations to meet and talk with readers.
- The meetup in Irvine is open to anyone and is meant to be inclusive for all attendees.

Key questions
- What can attendees expect at the meetup?
- What will Scott be discussing with attendees?
- How can attendees get involved in the SSC community after the meetup?
